mapper.sql: id, age, create_time, create_user, name, password
mapper.insert:
insert into user
id,
age,
create_time,
create_user,
name,
password,

mapper.update:
update user
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
